Transaction.desc: 大小通道交易处理

DynSentence.name: UpdRecSts
DynSentence.Sentence: UPDATE afebatrec SET RecSts='%s',HTxnSt='%s',HRspCd='%s' WHERE DskNo='%s' AND SeqNo='%s'

DynSentence.name: UpdRecSts1
DynSentence.Sentence: UPDATE afebatrec SET HRspCd='%s', RecSts='2' WHERE DskNo='%s' AND SeqNo='%s'

DynSentence.name: UpdThdJnl
DynSentence.Sentence: LogNo='%s'

Transaction.desc: 银电业务开工交易

DynSentence.name: QryCrpAgr
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT TActNo, BBusTyp FROM savcrpagr WHERE CAgtNo='%s' AND SvrSts='1'

DynSentence.name: QryInfCtl
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT StrAddr,DstAddr,WdoDat,CreOrg,OprCod,Status FROM efeinfctl WHERE EfeId='%s'

DynSentence.name: UdpInfCtl
DynSentence.Sentence: UPDATE efeinfctl Set Status='%s',DlTxt='%s' WHERE EfeId='%s'

If.Set: RspMsg=银电系统已在开工状态

Transaction.desc: 银电业务停工交易

DynSentence.name: QryCrpAgr
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT TActNo, BBusTyp FROM savcrpagr WHERE CAgtNo='%s' AND SvrSts='1'

DynSentence.name: QryInfCtl
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT StrAddr,DstAddr,WdoDat,CreOrg,OprCod,Status FROM efeinfctl WHERE EfeId='%s'

DynSentence.name: UdpInfCtl
DynSentence.Sentence: UPDATE efeinfctl Set Status='%s',DlTxt='%s' WHERE EfeId='%s'

If.Set: RspMsg=银电系统已在停工状态

Transaction.desc: 银行查询/增加/修改/删除客户信息交易

DynSentence.name: InsCusAgt
DynSentence.Sentence: INSERT INTO efekcusagt(BrNo,NodNo,CAgtNo,WDMC,QDBZ,JFH,JSHMC,XQYYHDM, XQYZH,XQYZHMC,ZHLX,ZJLX,ZJHM,LXDH,SJHM,EMAIL,BZ) VALUES('%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s', '%s','%s','%s','%s', '%s','%s')

DynSentence.name: UdpCusAgt
DynSentence.Sentence: UPDATE efecusagt set BrNo='%s',NodNo='%s',CAgtNo='%s',WDMC='%s', QDBZ='%s',JSHMC='%s',XQYYHDM='%s',XQYZH='%s',XQYZHMC='%s', ZHLX='%s',ZJLX='%s',ZJHM='%s',LXDH='%s',SJHM='%s',EMAIL='%s',BZ='%s' WHERE JFH='%s'

DynSentence.name: CclCusAgt
DynSentence.Sentence: UPDATE efecusagt SET QDBZ='%s' WHERE JFH='%s'

Transaction.desc: 银行柜台电费代收查询交易
银行柜台电费代收缴费交易

DynSentence.name: QryCrpAgr
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT TActNo, BBusTyp FROM savcrpagr WHERE BrNo='%s' AND CAgtNo='%s' AND SvrSts='1'

DynSentence.name: QryInfCtl
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT StrAddr,DstAddr,WdoDat,CreOrg,OprCod,Status FROM efeinfctl WHERE EfeId='%s'

DynSentence.name: Insefechkinf
DynSentence.Sentence: INSERT INTO efechkinf(BrNo,CAgtNo,LogNo,ECD,WDO,EDD,JFH,KKB,ActNo,KAT,CUN,TxnAmt,KFG,ActNam,PCF,MNT,WYSB,SFF,TxnCod,EfeId) VALUES('%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s')

DynSentence.name: Insefekchkdtl
DynSentence.Sentence: INSERT INTO efekchkdtl(BrNo,LogNo,JFXH,JFJE,MON,JLD,YSH,CPS,MNS,PCC,EfeId) VALUES('%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s')

DynSentence.name: UdpEfea_0
DynSentence.Sentence: update efechkinf set TLogNo='%s',TckNo='%s',Status='%s' where EfeId='%s' and WDO='%s' and ActNo='%s' and LogNo='%s'

DynSentence.name: UdpEfeadtl
DynSentence.Sentence: update efekchkdtl set TLogNo='%s' where EfeId='%s' and LogNo='%s'

DynSentence.name: UdpEfeaSts
DynSentence.Sentence: update efechkinf set Status='%s' where EfeId='%s' and LogNo='%s'

If.Set: RspMsg=无该单位协议或数据库错

Transaction.desc: 银行柜台当日代收冲销交易

DynSentence.name: QryChkInf
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT ActTyp, JYLSH YJYLSH, JYRQ YJYRQ, JYSJ YJYSJ, SFFS, FYLX, RZYHDM, DWBM, JFH, JSHMC, YDDZ, KKZH, KKZHMC, BFJFBZ, ZWLSH, DFNY, HBFH, SKJE YSKJE FROM efekchkinf WHERE LogNo='%s'

DynSentence.name: Chk_TLogNo
DynSentence.Sentence: select HTxnSt,TlrId, HLogNo OHLogNo, TckNo OTckNo,TXNAMT TTXNAMT from afetxnjnl where BrNo='%s' and LogNo='%s' AND HTxnSt IN ('T','S','U','C') order by LogNo desc

DynSentence.name: UdpEfeaSts
DynSentence.Sentence: update efechkinf set Status='%s' where EfeId='%s' and LogNo='%s'

If.Set: RspMsg=该笔缴费不能进行冲销

Transaction.desc: 供电方发起单笔代扣交易

DynSentence.name: QryCrpAgr
DynSentence.Sentence: select BBusTyp,TActNo from savcrpagr where BrNo='%s' and CAgtNo='%s' and SvrSts='1'

DynSentence.name: QryInfCtl
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT BrNo,EfeId FROM efeinfctl WHERE DLIP='%s'

DynSentence.name: Insefechkinf
DynSentence.Sentence: INSERT INTO efechkinf(BrNo,CAgtNo,LogNo,TLogNo,TckNo,ECD,WDO,EDD,JFH,KKB,ActNo,KAT,CUN,TxnAmt,KFG,ActNam,PCF,MNT,JBR,GDO,WYSB,SFF,TxnCod,Status,EfeId) VALUES('%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s')

DynSentence.name: Insefekchkdtl
DynSentence.Sentence: INSERT INTO efekchkdtl(BrNo,LogNo,TLogNo,JFXH,JFJE,MON,JLD,YSH,CPS,MNS,PCC,EfeId) VALUES('%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s')

Transaction.desc: 批量代扣返回
供电单笔当日代扣抹帐交易

DynSentence.name: QryInfCtl
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT BrNo,EfeId FROM efeinfctl WHERE DLIP='%s'

DynSentence.name: Chk_TLogNo
DynSentence.Sentence: select HTxnSt,LogNo,TlrId, HLogNo OHLogNo, TckNo OTckNo,TXNAMT TTXNAMT from afetxnjnl where CAgtNo='%s' and LogNo='%s' AND HTxnSt IN ('T','S','U','C') order by LogNo desc

DynSentence.name: UdpEfeaSts
DynSentence.Sentence: update efechkinf set Status='%s' where EfeId='%s' and LogNo='%s'

Transaction.desc: 供电发起批量代扣交易

DynSentence.name: QryInfCtl
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT BrNo,EfeId FROM efeinfctl WHERE DLIP='%s'

DynSentence.name: QueDskNam
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT DskNo FROM pubbatinf WHERE BrNo='%s' AND ActDat='%s' AND DskNam='%s' AND Status='P'

DynSentence.name: GetCAgtNo
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT DISTINCT CAgtNo FROM efebatinf WHERE EfeId='%s' AND DskNo='%s'

DynSentence.name: GetCrpInf
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT b.CrpNam FROM savcrpagr a,savcrpinf b WHERE a.Brno='%s' AND a.CAgtNo='%s' AND a.CrpCod=b.CrpCod AND a.BrNo=b.BrNo

DynSentence.name: Chk_CrpAgr
DynSentence.Sentence: select a.BrNo,a.BBusTyp,a.TActNo,a.CrpCod,a.TxnDir,b.StlAct from savcrpagr a, savcrpinf b where a.BrNo='%s' and a.CAgtNo='%s' and SvrSts='1' and b.CrpCod=a.CrpCod and a.brno=b.brno

DynSentence.name: Chk_CrpSignIn
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT 'Y' YN from table(values(1)) as anony where Exists(select * from savthdinf where BrNo='%s' and CAgtNo='%s' and status='1')

DynSentence.name: QryBatRec
DynSentence.Sentence: select DskNo,SeqNo,OldAct from afebatrec where DskNo='%s'

DynSentence.name: UpdBatRec1
DynSentence.Sentence: UPDATE afebatrec Set ActNo='%s',ActNam='%s',ActTyp='%s' where DskNo='%s' AND SeqNo='%s'

DynSentence.name: UpdBatRec2
DynSentence.Sentence: UPDATE afebatrec Set ActNo='%s',ActNam='%s',ActTyp='%s',ActSqn='%s' where DskNo='%s' AND SeqNo='%s'

DynSentence.name: DeleteInf444
DynSentence.Sentence: Delete from fbpbatinf444 where DskNo='%s'

DynSentence.name: DeleteInf
DynSentence.Sentence: Delete from pubbatinf where BrNo='%s' AND DskNo='%s'

DynSentence.name: UpdCtlSuc1
DynSentence.Sentence: UPDATE efebfilctl444 a SET DskSts='0',DskNo='%s' WHERE DskNam='%s' and ActDAT='%s'

DynSentence.name: UpdCtlSuc2
DynSentence.Sentence: UPDATE efebfilctl444 a SET DskSts='0',DskNo='%s' WHERE DskNam='%s' and ActDAT='%s'

DynSentence.name: SelCusAgtInf2
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT count(*) cnt2 FROM afebatrec WHERE CAgtNo='%s' and DskNo='%s' and SeqNo in (select SUBSTR(b.PNO,6,5) from efecusagt a,efebatinf b where a.BrNo='%s' and b.DskNo='%s' and a.JFH=b.JFH and a.ActNo=b.ActNo and a.ActNam=b.ActNam and a.Status='0')

DynSentence.name: UpdCusAgtInf2
DynSentence.Sentence: UPDATE afebatrec a SET RecSts='Y' WHERE CAgtNo='%s' and DskNo='%s' and SeqNo in (select SUBSTR(b.PNO,6,5) from efecusagt a,efebatinf b where a.BrNo='%s' and b.DskNo='%s' and a.JFH=b.JFH and a.ActNo=b.ActNo and a.ActNam=b.ActNam and a.Status='0')

DynSentence.name: SelNoAgr
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT count(*) cnt1 FROM afebatrec WHERE RecSts!='Y' AND CAgtNo='%s' AND DskNo='%s'

DynSentence.name: UpdNoAgr
DynSentence.Sentence: UPDATE afebatrec SET RecSts='X',HTxnST='S',HRspCd='400004' WHERE RecSts!='Y' AND CAgtNo='%s' AND DskNo='%s'

DynSentence.name: UpRsvFld
DynSentence.Sentence: UPDATE pubbatinf SET RsvFld='%s' WHERE BrNo='%s' AND DskNo='%s'

DynSentence.name: UpEfeLogNo
DynSentence.Sentence: UPDATE efebatinf a SET a.LogNo=(select b.LogNo from afebatrec b WHERE a.DskNo='%s' AND b.DskNo=a.DskNo AND b.SeqNo=SUBSTR(a.PNO,6,5))

DynSentence.name: UpEfeInf
DynSentence.Sentence: UPDATE efebatinf SET PID='%s',CUN='%s',EDD='%s',TLogNo='%s' WHERE DskNo='%s'

If.Set: RspMsg=STRCAT(改批次已录入，批次号为,$DskNo)
RspMsg=查询单位协议时系统错误
RspMsg=查询单位协议时无有效单位协议
RspMsg=检查单位签到状态时系统错误
RspMsg=检查单位签到状态时该单位未签到

Transaction.desc: 供电发起批量代扣取消

DynSentence.name: ChkDskSts
DynSentence.Sentence: select * from efebfilctl444 WHERE DskNam='%s'

DynSentence.name: QryInfCtl
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT BrNo,EfeId FROM efeinfctl WHERE DstAddr='%s'

DynSentence.name: QueBatInf
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT DskNo,Status,CmtFlg FROM pubbatinf WHERE BrNo='%s' AND ActDat='%s' AND DskNam='%s'

If.Set: RspMsg=检查批次状态时系统错误
RspMsg=检查批次状态时未发现该批次

Case.Set: RspMsg=扣费完成并已返回结果无法撤销

Transaction.desc: 文件批量完成通知第三方

DynSentence.name: QryInfCtl
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT StrAddr,DstAddr,WdoDat,CreOrg,OprCod,Status FROM efeinfctl WHERE EfeId='%s'

DynSentence.name: GetCrpInf
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT a.OrnCnt,a.OrnAmt,b.CAgtNo,b.BBusTyp,c.CrpNam FROM pubbatinf a,savcrpagr b,savcrpinf c WHERE a.DskNo='%s' AND a.RsvFld=b.CAgtNo AND b.CrpCod=c.CrpCod AND b.BrNo=c.BrNo

DynSentence.name: QryBatInf
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT BrNo,DskNo,SndTlr TlrId,NodNo,DskNam From pubbatinf WHERE DskNo='%s'

DynSentence.name: QryTxnInf
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT a.*,c.* FROM afebatrec a,efebatinf c WHERE a.DskNo='%s' AND a.DskNo=c.DskNo AND a.LogNo=c.LogNo ORDER BY c.PNO

DynSentence.name: QryTxnHed
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT distinct BrNo,PID,CUN,EDD,WYSB,ActDat,EfeId FROM efebatinf WHERE DskNo='%s'

DynSentence.name: TotSql
DynSentence.Sentence: select count(*) TotCnt, COALESCE(sum(CAST(TxnAmt AS BIGINT)),0) TotAmt from afebatrec where DskNo='%s'

DynSentence.name: TotSucSql
DynSentence.Sentence: select count(*) STotCnt, COALESCE(sum(CAST(TxnAmt AS BIGINT)),0) STotAmt from afebatrec where DskNo='%s' and HTxnSt='S' and RecSts='1'

DynSentence.name: TotFalSql
DynSentence.Sentence: select count(*) FTotCnt, COALESCE(sum(CAST(TxnAmt AS BIGINT)),0) FTotAmt from afebatrec where DskNo='%s' and HTxnSt in ('S','F') and RecSts!='1'

DynSentence.name: UpEfeStatus
DynSentence.Sentence: UPDATE efebatinf a SET a.Status=(select b.HTXNST from afebatrec b WHERE a.DskNo='%s' AND b.DskNo=a.DskNo AND b.LogNo=a.LogNo)

Transaction.desc: 银电业务开工交易

If.Set: RspMsg=银电系统已在开工状态

Transaction.desc: 银电业务停工交易

If.Set: RspMsg=银电系统已在开工状态

Transaction.desc: 供电发起代扣协议变更交易

DynSentence.name: QryInfCtl
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT BrNo FROM efeinfctl WHERE DLIP='%s'

DynSentence.name: InsCusAgt
DynSentence.Sentence: INSERT INTO efekcusagt(BrNo,NodNo,CAgtNo,WDMC,QDBZ,JFH,JSHMC,XQYYHDM, XQYZH,XQYZHMC,ZHLX,ZJLX,ZJHM,LXDH,SJHM,EMAIL,BZ) VALUES('%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s', '%s','%s','%s','%s', '%s','%s')

DynSentence.name: UdpCusAgt
DynSentence.Sentence: UPDATE efecusagt set BrNo='%s',NodNo='%s',CAgtNo='%s',WDMC='%s', QDBZ='%s',JSHMC='%s',XQYYHDM='%s',XQYZH='%s',XQYZHMC='%s', ZHLX='%s',ZJLX='%s',ZJHM='%s',LXDH='%s',SJHM='%s',EMAIL='%s',BZ='%s' WHERE JFH='%s'

DynSentence.name: CclCusAgt
DynSentence.Sentence: UPDATE efecusagt SET QDBZ='%s' WHERE JFH='%s'

If.Set: RspMsg=银电系统已在停工状态

Transaction.desc: 银行到供电核对代扣协议交易

DynSentence.name: QryInfCtl
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT StrAddr,DstAddr,WdoDat,CreOrg,OprCod,Status FROM efeinfctl WHERE EfeId='%s'

DynSentence.name: GetTxnJnl
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT JFH,JLD,WDO,ActNo,ActNam,STATUS,GPF,TEL,MOB,TXT,YBZ,EML FROM efecusagt WHERE WDO='%s' AND EfeId='%s'

DynSentence.name: GetTotal
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT count(*) as TotalDeal FROM efecusagt WHERE WDO='%s' AND EfeId='%s'

If.Set: RspMsg=银电系统已在关闭状态

FlowCtrl.Set: MsgInf1=STRCAT(向供电方发送对账文件成功)

Transaction.desc: 银行发起银行代扣代收电费对帐交易

DynSentence.name: QryInfCtl
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT StrAddr,DstAddr,WdoDat,CreOrg,OprCod,Status FROM efeinfctl WHERE EfeId='%s'

DynSentence.name: GetTxnJnl
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT a.*,b.*,c.* FROM afetxnjnl a,efechkinf b,efekchkdtl c WHERE a.CAgtNo = '%s' AND a.ActDat='%s' AND TxnSts='S' AND a.TLOGNO = b.TLOGNO AND a.BrNo=b.Brno AND a.LOGNO=b.LOGNO AND b.TLOGNO = c.TLOGNO AND b.BrNo=c.Brno AND b.LOGNO=c.LOGNO

DynSentence.name: TotalDeal
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT Count(*) TotalDeal, COALESCE(sum(CAST(TxnAmt AS BIGINT)),0) TotalFee FROM afetxnjnl WHERE CAgtNo = '%s' AND ActDat='%s' AND TxnSts='S' AND TxnCod in ('460405','460420')

DynSentence.name: PaySuccDeal
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT Count(*) PaySuccDeal, COALESCE(sum(CAST(TxnAmt AS BIGINT)),0) PaySuccBill FROM afetxnjnl WHERE CAgtNo = '%s' AND ActDat='%s' AND TxnSts='S' AND TxnCod in ('460405','460420')

DynSentence.name: InsChkRec
DynSentence.Sentence: INSERT INTO efechkrec values('%s','%s','%s','%s','%s',' ',' ','%s')

DynSentence.name: UpdChkRec
DynSentence.Sentence: UPDATE efechkrec SET TRspCd='%s',RtnMsg='%s' WHERE EfeId='%s' AND LogNo='%s'

If.Set: RspMsg=银电系统已在关闭状态

FlowCtrl.Set: MsgInf1=STRCAT(向供电方发送对账文件成功)

Transaction.desc: 电力对公缴费记账回执打印

Arg.name: Summary
Arg.value: 电力对公缴费记账回执

Arg.name: Summary
Arg.value: 电力对公缴费记账回执

Transaction.desc: 银行达账电费明细文件

DynSentence.name: QryCrpAgr
DynSentence.Sentence: select BBusTyp,TActNo from savcrpagr where BrNo='%s' and CAgtNo='%s' and SvrSts='1'

DynSentence.name: QryInfCtl
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT StrAddr,DstAddr,WdoDat,CreOrg,OprCod,Status FROM efeinfctl WHERE EfeId='%s'

DynSentence.name: QryBatInf
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT a.*,b.*,c.* FROM afetxnjnl a,efechkinf b,efekchkdtl c WHERE a.CAgtNo = '%s' AND a.ActDat >='%s' and a.ActDat <='%s' and HTxnSt='S' AND a.LOGNO=b.LOGNO AND b.LOGNO=c.LOGNO

DynSentence.name: QryBatInf2
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT a.*,b.* FROM afetxnjnl a,efebatinf b WHERE a.CAgtNo='%s' AND a.ActDat >='%s' and a.ActDat <='%s' and HTxnSt='S' AND a.LOGNO=b.LOGNO

DynSentence.name: PrtFmtHed
DynSentence.Sentence: %s银行达帐电费明细\n 到账日期|银行编码|金额|账号|账号名称|摘要|唯一标识码|交易码|前置流水号\n

DynSentence.name: PrtFmtEnd
DynSentence.Sentence: <结束>

Transaction.desc: 广东电力电费清算报表打印

DynSentence.name: QryJnlInfo
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT LogNo FROM afetxnjnl WHERE BrNo='%s' AND CAgtNo='%s' AND ActDat >='%s' and ActDat <='%s' order by LogNo asc

DynSentence.name: Updatquery
DynSentence.Sentence: update afetxnjnl set ChkFlg='1' where CAgtNo='%s' AND ActDat='%s' and logno='%s'

Transaction.desc: 广东电力电费清算

DynSentence.name: QryCrpAgr
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT a.TActNo,b.CrpNam,b.STLACT FROM savcrpagr a,savcrpinf b WHERE a.CAgtNo='%s' AND a.CrpCod=b.CrpCod AND a.BrNo=b.BrNo

DynSentence.name: Updafetxnjnl
DynSentence.Sentence: update afetxnjnl set ChkFlg='1' WHERE ActDat ='%s' and CAgtNo='%s' and TxnSts='S'

Transaction.desc: 广东电力电费对可疑交易进行状态修改

DynSentence.name: Updafetxnjnl
DynSentence.Sentence: update afetxnjnl set HTxnSt='%s' WHERE ActDat ='%s' and CAgtNo='%s' and HTxnSt IN ('T','U') and TckNo='%s'

DynSentence.name: QryCrpAgr
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT a.TActNo,b.CrpNam,b.STLACT FROM savcrpagr a,savcrpinf b WHERE a.CAgtNo='%s' AND a.CrpCod=b.CrpCod AND a.BrNo=b.BrNo

Transaction.desc: 广东电力电费对可疑交易进行状态查询

DynSentence.name: QryCrpAgr
DynSentence.Sentence: select ActNo,TCUSNM,TCUSID,TxnAmt from afetxnjnl WHERE ActDat ='%s' and CAgtNo='%s' and TckNo='%s' and HTxnSt IN ('F','C') and ChkFlg='0'

Transaction.desc: 广东省电力电费查询清算金额

DynSentence.name: QryCrpAgr
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT a.TActNo,b.CrpNam,b.STLACT FROM savcrpagr a,savcrpinf b WHERE a.CAgtNo='%s' AND a.CrpCod=b.CrpCod AND a.BrNo=b.BrNo

DynSentence.name: QryEfeTot
DynSentence.Sentence: select sum(cast(TxnAmt as bigint)) as SumAmt,coalesce(COUNT(*),0) TotCnt from afetxnjnl where ActDat = '%s' and CAgtNo= '%s' and HTxnSt IN ('S','T','U') and HRspcd='SC0000' and TTxnst IN ('S','U') and ChkFlg='0'

Transaction.desc: 对账信息查询

DynSentence.name: QryChkRec
DynSentence.Sentence: select SndTim,LogNo,ChkFil,TRspCd,RtnMsg from efechkrec where EfeId='%s' and ActDat >='%s' and ActDat <='%s'
